summary: The very different Betsy and Jake are getting married. They want a small wedding but their dads want to give a big.
cast: Alan Alda|Joey Bishop|Madeline Kahn|Anthony LaPaglia|Catherine O'Hara|Joe Pesci|Molly Ringwald|Ally Sheedy|Burt Young|Julie Bovasso|Nicolas Coster|Bibi Besch|Dylan Walsh|Camille Saviola|Allan Rich|Sully Boyar|Monica Carr|Frankie Faison|Tom Mardirosian|Larry Block|Helen Hanft|Mario Todisco|Paul B. Mixon|William Duff-Griffin|Thomas John Caliguri|Samuel L. Jackson|Janet Pasquale|Harry L. Seddon|Carol Bawer|David Kimball|Curtis Lambert|Hamilton Perkins|Larry Rapp|Adrian Van Daalen
title: Boda pasada por agua
